title: San Carlos
description: A lingering cranberry sweet-tart acidity stands out against this coffee's dense, fudgy sweetness.

title: Gotham Blend
description: Extra dark, rich, and full of chocolatey indulgence. It may not be the coffee we deserve, but it's definitely the coffee we need right now.

title: Emporium House Blend
description: Coffee should bring people together. This blend manages to unite three distinctly delicious single origins to create a truly harmonious coffee. Complex but approachable, no matter how you brew it. (Formerly known as Spicewood 71.)

title: Organic Toketee
description: You’re fancy, huh? So is this elevated take on the classic drip, blend. It’s carefully curated, seasonally rotating, and of course—cultured.

title: Oscar Fernandez
description: A long-lasting blood orange acidity plays beautifully with this coffee's notes of black tea sweetened with wildflower honey.

title: Burundi
description: Big and bold, this rich coffee offers plenty of dark sweetness: think cocoa or raisin. Perfect on its own, or with a splash of your milk of choice.
